title: LEAVERBUSTER IS BUSTED.
body: So I got a 20 minute wait time for d/c from a game because my ping was bad. Although i left i still came back. After the game i got a 20 minute wait. -.- I just now waited TWENTY MINUTES. I was AFK and couldnt accept the game (((((((: NOW I HAVE TO WAIT 20 MINUTES AGAIN. RIOT WHATS GOING ON

replies.body: An account will receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple games and not just one, so you'd need to have a history of it.  Even if a leaver returns to the game, it's still a period of time where others were down a player which causes a negative experience for them.  Your best bet would be to resolve whatever is causing you to have ping issues.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview for that.  Hope that helps!

Riot 101, All of this will be clearly your fault, Rito is never wrong or at fault for anything. oh and remember if you tilt in game for having to wait over an hour for there broken system, you will probably get reported and banned. Good luck.
